text: Jade Generals are elite warriors promoted from the ranks of the Jade Warriors, seasoned veterans with exceptional martial skills and military strategies.

Jade Generals are elite warriors promoted from the ranks of the Jade Warriors, seasoned veterans with exceptional martial skills and military strategies.
Dragon Horses are rare and majestic, moving faster than wind and thunder. However, they are also unruly and difficult to tame. If not handled by a brave warrior, they may cause harm instead.
Qilins are mystical creatures inhabiting Grand Cathay, possessing the ability to control lightning. They are proud and swift, and only those with both wisdom and courage can tame them.

The true defenders of Cathay's peace are the guardians upon the Great Bastion. They stand against Chaos with their unwavering will, ensuring the tranquility of Cathay. The Jade Generals are particularly outstanding among them.
The flames of war have arrived, the defenders of the Great Bastion must rally!
Convicts have always been a valuable addition to the Great Bastion garrison. For a chance at redemption, they are willing to risk their lives and disregard personal gain.
Facing invaders who encroach upon their homeland, the soldiers of Grand Cathay unite in their hatred, delivering a powerful counterattack to the aggressors.
Upon the Jade General's request, equipment from various weapon workshops across Grand Cathay is continuously delivered to the soldiers.
The Jade General charges into battle, leading the way, inspiring all soldiers in the army
The Jade General charges into battle, leading the way, becoming the courage of the army
The Jade General, shouting in the heat of battle, orders the soldiers to put on a second layer of armor, ready to fight another round

Through a special breathing technique, the Jade General quickly recovers his energy, but this method is like drinking poison to quench thirst, and using it again in a short time will endanger his life
The Jade General fights bravely, becoming more courageous with each battle
The soldiers, following the Jade General, firmly believe that victory will ultimately belong to them, and launch a frenzied attack

The Jade General commands the army with strict discipline and well-organized orders. Under his leadership, the soldiers of Grand Cathay form a well-functioning and massive war machine, capable of easily crushing any enemy.

At the Jade General's signal, several soldiers pick up flags and wave them in a specific rhythm. The Great Bastion guards in the distance, holding observation mirrors, quickly decipher the meaning of the flags: a set of coordinates.\\nNext, the artillery placed on the Great Bastion aims at the location indicated by the coordinates.
Proper medical care can save lives that would otherwise be lost, but this process involves some risks...
A good general never throws all his troops into battle at once. After the initial engagement, fresh reinforcements are the only way a general can influence the battlefield.
New workshops are established, working day and night to supply the front lines. Thanks to the abundant crossbow bolts, new tactics can be implemented.
The soldiers of Grand Cathay unite under the banner of Wei-Jin, chanting the Dragon Emperor's name in unison, their morale soaring.

The Taoists of Shen Yang Guan have created a special breathing technique that regulates the state of body and mind through specific rhythmic breathing, allowing for rapid energy recovery in a short time.
Activates the ability: "Fight to the Death"
The pain of battle awakens the Jade General's full potential, making him feel even stronger than usual
The soldiers, following the Jade General, firmly believe that victory will ultimately belong to them, and launch a frenzied attack.
Swift artillery fire from the Great Bastion delivers a devastating blow to the enemy
Well-trained soldiers carefully navigate the battlefield, quickly locating the wounded and providing meticulous treatment
A reserve force meticulously arranged by the Jade General, only to be deployed at the most critical moment
Under the command of the Jade General, the Jade Warrior crossbowmen unleash a powerful volley, dealing a heavy blow to the enemy
Activates the ability: "Follow the Banner", summoning a banner on the battlefield that grants powerful buffs to nearby soldiers
Where the banner points, we shall go. This mortal flesh shall become the eternal Great Bastion of Cathay

New Lord Rank: %+n for Jade Generals
Han Peng vows to eradicate all traces of Tzeentch from the lands of Grand Cathay. Only then can the soldiers who died under Tzeentch's influence rest in peace

Huo Yi is a recognized scoundrel, indulging in all vices except for his military talent and unwavering loyalty to Grand Cathay, which no one doubts. Therefore, soldiers are willing to fight under his command
